i listen to a lot of strange music.
while both my parents have thick european accents , i do not.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy spending time in my garden, tending to my plants and watching them grow.
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.
I am more concerned with my creations than my appearance.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I'm a musician who recently became truthful with my coach

content.text: Hey, I'm new to this. How's it going?
I'm good, just got done with work. I work part time at the campus library.
Oh cool, I'm a musician. I recently became truthful with my coach.
What's your favorite thing about being a musician?
I love getting to create new music and share it with others.
That's awesome! I love listening to music. What's your favorite genre?
I listen to a lot of different genres, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
I've never really been into indie rock, but I'm always open to trying new things.
You should! There's a lot of great indie bands out there.
I will, thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! Do you have any hobbies outside of work?
I like to spend time in my garden, tending to my plants.
That's so cool! I love gardening, but I don't have much time for it these days.
I know what you mean, it can be hard to find the time.
